description:
My place is close to Citi field Stadium, US Open and Flushing Meadows Park.
You’ll love my place because  it is spacious, comfy and clean.  It is in a quiet neighborhood.  It is also not too far from the 7 train.

I have a private parking space available for your use if necessary.
name: Olga's Getaway
review: Olga is the perfect host, she makes everything so you feel like at home. The appartement is comparable to a suite in a palace and you'll find things that u probably don't have at home, but so useful. 200m from the bus, which will take you in 15mn to the Subway. All in all you are in Manhattan in 40mn. Thanks again
